channel.title: Coder needed please:)
channel.description: hello, i'm making a new rsps, yes i did leech the source and client and give them full credit "uncalled attack" but after me and whoever wants to help me code it, it will be a brand new server i have great idea's on how to make it the best server that can ever be haha ( i know its impossible but still.) i will not leave your name outa it ull get as much if not more credit then i get, ull also be co-owner of the server i think we can run a great server and make it one of the best so just message me on here on leave a post or add me on skype - kkyleg - is my username on skype thanks everyone, have a great day ~godog

item.title: Coder needed please:)
item.dc:creator: @godog godog
item.description:
@godog wrote:

yes, but only if i can find someone to help me

item.title: Coder needed please:)
item.dc:creator: @godog godog
item.description:
@godog wrote:

it would but i just hate having to do it the time to put into it, it could take months just to get running let alone all the updates ud have to do to it. i mean using a another source and programming it completely differently sound better id rather take a week to reprogram everything and make it completely different so id have the right to put my name on it, its still something i can be proud of.

Read full topic

item.title: Coder needed please:)
item.dc:creator: @Djayboi6 Dj_
item.description:
@Djayboi6 wrote:

Oh i know the feeling, i still can’t program(code) myself but i just try to push others to learn as im trying to learn myself. Search the forums for basic java tutorials. General programming would be a great place for you to do some research.

Read full topic

item.title: Coder needed please:)
item.dc:creator: @godog godog
item.description:
@godog wrote:

if i could find like a nice coder and all that id be all for a new base a clean slate but i don’t know anyone who would wanna do it i understand from what ur coming from but i try’d to code this and i like almost shot my self cause i try’d too teach myself cause i cant learn from reading, i learn from doing and i couldnt do anything right.

Read full topic

item.title: Coder needed please:)
item.dc:creator: @Djayboi6 Dj_
item.description:
@Djayboi6 wrote:

[quote=“Skyru, post:7, topic:435059”][quote author=Dj_ link=topic=537777.msg3933107#msg3933107 date=1330842648]
If you want to make a new rsps then why dont you start with a clean base where you can program your own wants to it instead of remaking a source thats already been worked on.
[/quote]
Or download a base that has already been worked on and improve it.[/quote]
True true but id feel more acomplished with working off a fresh source, personal opinion i guess. And i see where your coming from godog but one benfit from making mistakes is learning from them so you know better the next time.

Read full topic

item.title: Coder needed please:)
